about_the_game:
Solar Flare has ceased operations going forward due to the current climate of the industry. Unfortunately this means there are no plans to continue with Fool's Gold currently. This prototype demo is our latest build we worked on and is still in the early stages of development. There is unfinished content and bugs which would not reflect our intended final release. We hope this demo still gives a taste of what we planned to deliver, thank you for the support!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This demo represents one of our Jungle World Levels. Featuring tons of Treasure, a variety of Enemies, a handful of useful Tools, A Cheeky Monkey, Zipline Traversal, Secret Areas, a delicious Scoring System and a Totem Boss at the end! Good luck adventurers!

short_description: Fool’s Gold is a chaotic, couch co-op adventure-themed heist! Two bumbling explorers will work together to traverse ancient tombs and temples, grabbing as much treasure as they can, while contending with deadly traps, perilous enemies, and environmental puzzles.
